summary: SummaryErborian's Centella Comfort & Soothe 3 Piece Set is a 3-step skincare routine powered by Centella Asiatica, a renowned ingredient in Korean skincare, known for soothing properties.
details: DetailsFeaturesStart off by gently removing impurities and makeup with Centella Cleansing Oil, followed by Centella Cleansing Gel for a double cleanse. Next, use Centella Cream daily moisturizer to visibly hydrate and soothe the skin.This three-step routine will leave your skin feeling soothed, hydrated and comfortable.Centella Asiatica, also known as Tiger grass, is a traditional herbal ingredient known for its soothing properties.Key IngredientsCentella Cream: 2% Centella Asiatica extract, Shea Butter, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Beta-glucanCentella Cleaning Oil: Centella Asiatica Oil Extract, Sweet Almond Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, BisabolifeCentella Cleansing Gel: Centella Asiatica Extract, Squalane, 7 Herbs ComplexResearch ResultsThis formula is formulated without silicones, parabens, phthalates.Contains less than one percent synthetic fragrances.Tested under dermatological supervision.Item 2624033How To UseCentella Cleansing Oil: Apply directly to dry skin and massage gently over the face and eye area with circular movements. Add a small amount of water to create a lather, then rinse thoroughly.Centella Cleansing Gel: Wet face and apply a small amount of cleanser to your face and eye area in vigorous, yet gentle, circular motions. Rinse well with cold water.Centella Cream: Apply morning and evening as your daily moisturizer after cleansing. Can be used as a makeup base.IngredientsCentella Cream: Aqua/Water, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Octyldodecanol, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Triheptanoin - Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, C9-12 Alkane, Dilinoleic Acid/Butanediol Copolymer, Glycol, Beta-Glucan, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, T-Butyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance.Centella Cleansing Gel: Aqua/Water, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Coco-Betaine, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Centella Asiatica Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Allantoin, Squalane, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Polyquaternium-7, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Potassium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance.Centella Cleansing Oil: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Prunus Amygdalus, Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Olus Oil/Vegetable Oil, Bisabolol, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Centella Cleansing Oil: Apply directly to dry skin and massage gently over the face and eye area with circular movements. Add a small amount of water to create a lather, then rinse thoroughly.Centella Cleansing Gel: Wet face and apply a small amount of cleanser to your face and eye area in vigorous, yet gentle, circular motions. Rinse well with cold water.Centella Cream: Apply morning and evening as your daily moisturizer after cleansing. Can be used as a makeup base.
ingredients: Parfum/Fragrance.Centella Cleansing Oil: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Love Erborian
reviews.comments: These are gold. I have been ysing these both for a while now and im obsessed. They are aldo the best travel cleansers too because a little goes a long way. AND the opening is big enough that you can refill it (if you have the full size). Or refill it with anything, really. But highly recommend!!!

reviews.headline: Disaster for postpartum rosacea
reviews.comments: I don't understand why this is absolutely destroying my skin--someone ingredient savvy please investigate! CeraVe AM and PM both burn horribly. I've developed this weird texture, almost like plaques, and my skin is tight and feels scaly after use.

reviews.headline: Only the Oil Cleanser is Worth It, IMO
reviews.comments: I've seen the most results from the oil cleanser and their clay and acid face mask (not apart of this set). The other products two products are kind of lackluster and don't justify the expensive price (in the full size). The moisturizer was very underwhelming, and the face wash was drying for my combination skin. I like the oil cleanser though. That's the only thing I recommended out of these products.
